00058 void CUpdater::randsample(vector<point> *data, int n,vector<point> *maybeinliners)
00059 {
00060   int total= data->size();
00061   int r;
00062   if(n>total)
00063     {
00064       cout<<"error"<<endl;
00065 
00066     }
00067   for (int i =1; i<n ; i++)
00068     {
00069       r=1+(int) ((total-i)*rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0));//rand()*(total-i);
00070       maybeinliners->push_back((*data)[r]);
00071       (*data)[r]=(*data)[total-i];
00072       data->pop_back();
00073     }
00074 }

00166 double CUpdater::fits(point p, param model)
00167 {
00168   double err=0;
00169   err+=(p.img[0]-(model.px[0]*p.ground[0]+model.px[1]*p.ground[1]+model.px[2]
00170                   +model.px[3]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[0]
00171                   +model.px[4]*p.ground[1]*p.ground[1]
00172                   +model.px[5]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[1]
00173                   ))*
00174     (p.img[0]-(model.px[0]*p.ground[0]+model.px[1]*p.ground[1]+model.px[2]
00175                +model.px[3]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[0]
00176                +model.px[4]*p.ground[1]*p.ground[1]
00177                +model.px[5]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[1]
00178                ));
00179   err+=(p.img[1]-(model.py[0]*p.ground[0]+model.py[1]*p.ground[1]+model.py[2]
00180                   +model.py[3]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[0]
00181                   +model.py[4]*p.ground[1]*p.ground[1]
00182                   +model.py[5]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[1]
00183                   ))*
00184     (p.img[1]-(model.py[0]*p.ground[0]+model.py[1]*p.ground[1]+model.py[2]
00185                +model.py[3]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[0]
00186                +model.py[4]*p.ground[1]*p.ground[1]
00187                +model.py[5]*p.ground[0]*p.ground[1]
00188                ));
00189   return sqrt(err);
00190 }
00191 double CUpdater::fit(param *model, vector<point> points)
00192 {
00193 
00194   CvMat *Bx,*By,*A,*Px,*Py;
00195   A=cvCreateMat(points.size(), 6,  CV_32FC1);
00196   Bx=cvCreateMat( points.size(),1, CV_32FC1);
00197   By=cvCreateMat( points.size(),1, CV_32FC1);
00198   Px=cvCreateMat( 6,1, CV_32FC1);
00199   Py=cvCreateMat( 6,1, CV_32FC1);
00200 
00201   for (int i =0;i<points.size();i++)
00202     {
00203       // cout<<"hh"<<endl;
00204       cvmSet(Bx,i,0,points[i].img[0]);
00205       cvmSet(By,i,0,points[i].img[1]);
00206       cvmSet(A,i,0,points[i].ground[0]);
00207       cvmSet(A,i,1,points[i].ground[1]);
00208       cvmSet(A,i,2,1.);
00209       cvmSet(A,i,3,points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[0]);
00210       cvmSet(A,i,4,points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[1]);
00211       cvmSet(A,i,5,points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[0]);
00212 
00213     }
00214   cvSolve(A,Bx,Px,CV_SVD);
00215   model->px[0]=cvmGet(Px,0,0);
00216   model->px[1]=cvmGet(Px,1,0);
00217   model->px[2]=cvmGet(Px,2,0);
00218   model->px[3]=cvmGet(Px,3,0);
00219   model->px[4]=cvmGet(Px,4,0);
00220   model->px[5]=cvmGet(Px,5,0);
00221   cvSolve(A,By,Py,CV_SVD);
00222   model->py[0]=cvmGet(Py,0,0);
00223   model->py[1]=cvmGet(Py,1,0);
00224   model->py[2]=cvmGet(Py,2,0);
00225   model->py[3]=cvmGet(Py,3,0);
00226   model->py[4]=cvmGet(Py,4,0);
00227   model->py[5]=cvmGet(Py,5,0);
00228   double err=0;
00229   for (int i =0;i<points.size();i++)
00230     {
00231       /* err+=(points[i].img[0]-(model->px[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->px[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->px[2]))*
00232          (points[i].img[0]-(model->px[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->px[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->px[2]));
00233          err+=(points[i].img[1]-(model->py[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->py[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->py[2]))*
00234          (points[i].img[1]-(model->py[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->py[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->py[2]));*/
00235       err+=(points[i].img[0]-(model->px[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->px[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->px[2]
00236                               +model->px[3]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[0]
00237                               +model->px[4]*points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[1]
00238                               +model->px[5]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[1]
00239                               ))*
00240         (points[i].img[0]-(model->px[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->px[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->px[2]
00241                            +model->px[3]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[0]
00242                            +model->px[4]*points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[1]
00243                         +model->px[5]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[1]
00244                            ));
00245         err+=(points[i].img[1]-(model->py[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->py[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->py[2]
00246                                 +model->py[3]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[0]
00247                                 +model->py[4]*points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[1]
00248                                 +model->py[5]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[1]
00249                                 ))*
00250           (points[i].img[1]-(model->py[0]*points[i].ground[0]+model->py[1]*points[i].ground[1]+model->py[2]
00251                              +model->py[3]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[0]
00252                              +model->py[4]*points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[1]
00253                              +model->py[5]*points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[1]
00254                              ));
00255         cvmSet(Bx,i,0,points[i].img[0]);
00256         cvmSet(By,i,0,points[i].img[1]);
00257         cvmSet(A,i,0,points[i].ground[0]);
00258         cvmSet(A,i,1,points[i].ground[1]);
00259         cvmSet(A,i,2,1.);
00260         cvmSet(A,i,3,points[i].ground[0]*points[i].ground[0]);
00261         cvmSet(A,i,4,points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[1]);
00262         cvmSet(A,i,5,points[i].ground[1]*points[i].ground[0]);
00263 
00264     }
00265   err/=points.size();
00266   err=sqrt(err);
00267   cvReleaseMat(&A);
00268   cvReleaseMat(&Bx);
00269   cvReleaseMat(&By);
00270   cvReleaseMat(&Px);
00271   cvReleaseMat(&Py);
00272 
00273   return err;
00274 }

00276 void CUpdater::TestRANSAC()
00277 {
00278   cout<<"in ransac"<<endl;
00279   point p;
00280   vector<point> orig_data;
00281   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00282     {
00283       if((*It)->state==st_inited){
00284         p.ground[0]=(*It)->pto.x;
00285         p.ground[1]=(*It)->pto.y;
00286         p.img[0]=(*It)->old_pto.x;
00287         p.img[1]=(*It)->old_pto.y;
00288         p.ID=(*It)->ID;
00289         orig_data.push_back(p);
00290       }//end if state
00291     }//end iterator
00292   if (orig_data.size()<10)
00293     {
00294       printf("ERROR no hay suficientes puntos\n");
00295     }else
00296     {
00297       cout <<"pre ranasac"<<endl;
00298       ranasac(orig_data,200,10,35.0,(int)(orig_data.size()/8));
00299     cout <<"post ranasca"<<endl;
00300     }
00301 }

00329 int CUpdater::update()
00330 {
00331   CvMat *h;
00332   h=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00333   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00334     {
00335       switch((*It)->state)
00336         {
00337         case st_empty:
00338           if((*It)->pto.x!=0 &&(*It)->pto.y!=0)
00339             {
00340               (*It)->state=st_inited;
00341               pModelCam->cvInverseParam(&h,(*It)->pto);
00342               (*It)->wx=cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,0,0);
00343               (*It)->wy=cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,1,0);
00344               (*It)->wz=cvmGet(pDataCam->translation,2,0);
00345               (*It)->theta=atan2(-cvmGet(h,1,0),sqrt(cvmGet(h,0,0)*cvmGet(h,0,0)+cvmGet(h,2,0)*cvmGet(h,2,0)));
00346               (*It)->phi=atan2(cvmGet(h,0,0),cvmGet(h,2,0));
00347               (*It)->rho=1./depth;
00348               cout<<"update_idpth "<<" "<<(*It)->wx<<" "<<(*It)->wy<<" "<<(*It)->wz<<" "<<(*It)->theta<<" "<<(*It)->phi<<" "<<(*It)->rho<<" "<<cvmGet(h,0,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(h,1,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(h,2,0)<<" "<<endl;
00349               //cvmCopy(pDataCam->rotation,(*It)->rot_unInit_1);
00350               //cvmCopy(pDataCam->translation,(*It)->trans_unInit_1);
00351               //(*It)->xpix_1=(*It)->pto.x;
00352               //(*It)->ypix_1=(*It)->pto.y;
00353             }
00354           break;
00355         case st_inited:
00356           (*It)->count++;
00357         default:
00358           break;
00359         }
00360 
00361     }
00362 
00363   cvReleaseMat(&h);
00364   //triangulate();
00365 
00366   return 0;
00367 }

00377 int CUpdater::busca_posibles_para_anadir(IplImage *f,IplImage *f2,int faltan)
00378 {
00379   //  CvPoint pts[20];
00380   int count;
00381   int num_max;
00382   num_max=20;
00383 
00384   // count=busca_esquinas(f, pts,num_max);

00386   int n_key;

00389   int n_key2;
00390   CvMat *points2;
00391 
00392   n_key=pTracker->Init(f, &keys, &points);
00393   n_key2=pTracker->Init(f2, &keys2, &points2);
00394 
00395    int dim = pTracker->getFeatDim();
00396    count=n_key;//points->rows;
00397 
00398    bool encontrado;
00399    int j=0;
00400    int insert=0;
00401    int surf_encontrado=0;
00402    unsigned char key[dim];
00403    for (int i=0; i<1000000; i++)
00404      {
00405        if(j<count){
00406          do {
00407             encontrado=true;
00409 
00410              float suma = 0;
00411              float suma_min = 10000000;
00412              float suma_sec = 10000000;
00413              float dif;
00414              unsigned int nearest_neighbour = 0;
00415                  //para cada muestra
00416              for (unsigned int ii = 0; ii<n_key2; ii++)
00417                {
00418              suma = 0;
00419              //para cada componente
00420              for (unsigned int jj = 0; jj<dim;jj++)
00421                {
00422                  //distancia en norma2
00423                  //         dif=example_pairs[i*64+j]-query[j];
00424                  //dif=cvmGet(keys2,ii,jj)-cvmGet(keys,j,jj); //FIXME ESTA PARTE ES MUY LENTA
00425                  dif=keys2[ii*dim+jj]-keys[j*dim+jj];
00426                  suma += dif*dif;
00427 
00428                }
00429              suma=sqrt(suma);
00430              if (suma < suma_min)
00431                {
00432                  suma_sec = suma_min;
00433                  suma_min = suma;
00434                  nearest_neighbour = ii;
00435                }else if (suma < suma_sec)
00436                {
00437                  suma_sec = suma;
00438                }
00439                }
00440             // cout<<" suma_min: "<<suma_min<<" nearest_neighbour "<<nearest_neighbour<<" suma_sec "<<suma_sec<<" ratio "<<suma_min/suma_sec<<endl;
00441 
00442              //query->data[0] = example_pairs[nearest_neighbour].data[0];
00443              if ((suma_min <100000)&&((suma_min/suma_sec)<0.8)){
00444 
00445              }else {
00446                encontrado=false;
00447                //return -1;
00448              }
00449              if (n_key2==0) encontrado = true; 
00450              if(encontrado==true) surf_encontrado++;
00453 
00454                //no cerca de un punto existente
00455                for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00456                      It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00457                  {
00458                    if((*It)->pto.x<(cvmGet(points,j,0)+point_sep) &&
00459                       (*It)->pto.y<(cvmGet(points,j,1)+point_sep) &&
00460                       (*It)->pto.x>(cvmGet(points,j,0)-point_sep) &&
00461                       (*It)->pto.y>(cvmGet(points,j,1)-point_sep))
00462                      {
00463                        encontrado=false;
00464                      }
00465                    if((*It)->state>=st_inited){      //FIXME no solo los inited esto evita la revisita?
00466                      if((*It)->projx<(cvmGet(points,j,0)+point_sep) &&
00467                         (*It)->projy<(cvmGet(points,j,1)+point_sep) &&
00468                         (*It)->projx>(cvmGet(points,j,0)-point_sep) &&
00469                         (*It)->projy>(cvmGet(points,j,1)-point_sep))
00470                        {
00471                          encontrado=false;
00472                        }
00473                    }
00474                  }
00475 
00476 
00477                if( (cvmGet(points,j,0)<border) ||
00478                       (cvmGet(points,j,1)<border) ||
00479                       (cvmGet(points,j,0)>(pDataCam->frame_width-border)) ||
00480                       (cvmGet(points,j,1)>(pDataCam->frame_height-border)))
00481                   {
00482                       encontrado = false;
00483                   }
00484 
00485                //calidad del punto mayor que un tamano FIXME ESTA CALIDAD DEPENDE DEL METODO
00486                if(cvmGet(points,j,2)<calidad_min_punto)
00487                  {
00488                    encontrado = false;
00489                  }
00490                //inserto si cumple todas las condiciones anteriores
00491                if (encontrado==true)
00492                  {
00493         //         cout << "inserto nuevo: "<<cvmGet(points,j,0)<<" "<<cvmGet(points,j,1)<<endl;
00494                    //pts2[insert]=pts[j];
00495                    for (int d =0; d<dim;d++)
00496                      {
00497                        key[d]=(unsigned char) keys[j*dim+d];//cvmGet(keys,j,d);
00498                        //cout<<"asignando key_char: "<<(int)key[d]<<" key_mat "<<cvmGet(keys,j,d)<<endl;
00499                      }
00500                    pMap->add_key(cvPoint((int)cvmGet(points,j,0),
00501                                          (int)cvmGet(points,j,1)),key,dim);
00502                    insert++;
00503                  }
00504                j++;
00505        }while(!encontrado && j<count);
00506       }//endif
00507     }//end for
00508 cout<<"surf: "<< "encontrados: "<< surf_encontrado<< " aceptados: "<<insert<<endl;
00509      if (keys!=0)   delete (keys);
00510      if (keys2!=0)   delete (keys2);
00511    //cvReleaseMat(&keys);
00512    cvReleaseMat(&points);
00513    cout<<"insertados: "<<insert<<" de "<<j<<endl;
00514    return insert;
00515 }
00521 int CUpdater::Add(IplImage *f,IplImage *f2)
00522 {
00523   int cornercount;
00524 
00525   int inited_vis=0;
00526   int inited_no_vis=0;
00527 
00528   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00529         It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00530     {
00531       if ((*It)->state==st_inited){
00532         inited_vis++;
00533       }
00534       if ((*It)->state==st_no_view){
00535         inited_no_vis++;
00536       }
00537     }
00538 
00539   cornercount=num_feat_min-inited_vis;//bbdd.size();
00540   cout<< "faltan "<<cornercount<<"esquinas"<<num_feat_min<<" "<<pMap->visible<<endl;
00541   int insert=0;
00542   if (cornercount>0)
00543     {
00544       insert = busca_posibles_para_anadir(f,f2,num_feat_max-pMap->visible);
00545     }
00546   return 0;
00547 }
00552 int CUpdater::AddByHand(IplImage *f)
00553 {
00554 
00555   int cornercount;
00556   cornercount=num_feat_min-pMap->visible;//bbdd.size();
00557   cout<< "faltan "<<cornercount<<"esquinas"<<endl;
00558   int insert=0;
00559   //if (cornercount>0)
00560     {
00561     CvPoint point;
00562 
00563       cvNamedWindow( "select" );
00564       cvSetMouseCallback("select",  on_mouse, (void*)&point);
00565       int *key;
00566       key=new int[pTracker->getFeatDim()];
00567       unsigned char *ckey;
00568       ckey=new unsigned char[pTracker->getFeatDim()];
00569       CvPoint oldpoint;
00570       oldpoint.x = point.x;
00571       oldpoint.y= point.y;
00572       while(cvWaitKey(100)!='q'){
00573       cvShowImage("select",f);
00574       CvPoint3D32f point2;
00575       if (point.x!=oldpoint.x || point.y!=oldpoint.y)
00576       {   float oldist=1000000;
00577           float dist;
00578           CvPoint p;
00579           for( int i = 0; i < pTracker->feat->total; i++ )
00580           {
00581              point2 = *(CvPoint3D32f*)cvGetSeqElem( pTracker->feat, i );
00582              float dx=0, dy=0;
00583              dx=point2.x-point.x;
00584              dy=point2.y-point.y;
00585              dist=dx*dx+dy*dy;
00586              if (dist< oldist){
00587                  oldist=dist;
00588                  p.x=(int)point2.x;
00589                  p.y=(int)point2.y;
00590              }
00591           }
00592             pTracker->Descriptor(f,&p,(int)point2.z, key);
00593             for (int kk =0 ; kk<pTracker->getFeatDim();kk++)
00594                 ckey[kk]=key[kk];
00595 
00596                     pMap->add_key(p,ckey,pTracker->getFeatDim());
00597                     insert++;
00598                     oldpoint.x = point.x;
00599                     oldpoint.y =point.y;
00600       }
00601       //insert = busca_posibles_para_anadir(f,f2,num_feat_max-pMap->visible);
00602       }
00603 }
00604   return 0;
00605 
00606 }
00610 int CUpdater::busca_esquinas(IplImage *f,CvPoint* pts,int count)
00611 {
00612   int cornercount;
00613   cornercount=count;
00614   //cvCvtColor(f,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00615   CvPoint2D32f corners[100];
00616   IplImage *grey, *eig_image, *temp;
00617   grey=cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(f), 8, 1 );
00618   eig_image = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(f), 32, 1 );
00619   temp=cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(f),32,1);
00620   cvCvtColor(f,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00621 
00622   cvGoodFeaturesToTrack(grey,eig_image,temp,corners,&cornercount,0.1, 40, NULL);
00623   for (int i=0;i<cornercount;i++){
00624     pts[i]=cvPointFrom32f( corners[i]);
00625   }
00626   cvReleaseImage(&grey);
00627   cvReleaseImage(&eig_image);
00628   cvReleaseImage(&temp);
00629   return cornercount;
00630 
00631 }
00636 int CUpdater::remove()
00637 {
00638   int i=0;
00639   std::cout << "remove ";
00640   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00641         It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00642     {
00643       if ((*It)->pto.x<0 ||(*It)->pto.y<0 ||
00644           isnan((*It)->wx)||isnan((*It)->wy)||isnan((*It)->wz))
00645         {
00646           cout<< "ERROR borro punto por not a number. estado:"<<(*It)->state <<"x y:"<<(*It)->pto.x<<" "<<(*It)->pto.y<< endl;
00647           //pMap->bbdd.erase(It);
00648           i++;
00649           pMap->visible--;
00650           exit(-1);
00651 
00652         }else if((*It)->pto.x<border ||(*It)->pto.y<border ||
00653                 (*It)->pto.x>pDataCam->frame_width-border ||(*It)->pto.y>pDataCam->frame_height-border )
00654               {
00655                 if((*It)->state==st_inited)
00656                   {
00657                     i++;
00658                     std::cout << "pongo punto como st_no_view: "<<(*It)->ID<<" "<<(*It)->pto.x<<" "<<(*It)->pto.y<<std::endl;
00659                     (*It)->state = st_no_view;
00660                     pMap->visible--;
00661                   }else if((*It)->state!=st_no_view)
00662                   {
00663                     cout<< "borro punto por no iniciado y fuera devista state: "<<(*It)->state << endl;
00664                     exit(-1);   
00665                     //pMap->bbdd.erase(It);
00666                     //pMap->visible--;
00667                   }
00668                }
00669 
00670     }
00671   return i;
00672 }
